attributes.additional_details:
CAMHS are failing children on a daily basis and the Government needs to address this  NOW!

I am a strong, confident and resourceful parent and able to seek what I need yet this has exhausted me and I am tired of fighting for help. So please imagine a parent who has no idea where to turn, who has no support or extended family, who lacks confidence and resources, imagine how they must be coping, especially when waiting lists are long and intervention is limited or non existent….this petition is for for them as well as my own daughter.

Please sign, one voice is unheard, 100,000 can make a difference.
